history.proof: intros ir1 ir2 H. induction H. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: Permutation_cons_app, IR_equiv_nil, Permutation_cons_app_inv, perm_swap, Permutation_sym, IR_equiv_cons. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: Permutation_cons_app, IR_equiv_nil, Permutation_cons_app_inv, perm_swap, Permutation_sym, IR_equiv_cons. - apply Permutation_sym. sauto lq: on depth: 3use: Permutation_cons_app, IR_equiv_nil, Permutation_cons_app_inv, perm_swap, Permutation_sym, IR_equiv_cons. - sfirstorder depth: 3use: Permutation_cons_app, IR_equiv_nil, Permutation_cons_app_inv, perm_swap, Permutation_sym, IR_equiv_cons.

exceptions.exn: In environment K : Type K_eq_dec : forall x y : K, {x = y} + {x <> y} Unable to unify "IR_equivalent [] []" with "Permutation [] []".

original: intros ir1 ir2 H. induction H. - apply IR_equiv_nil. - apply IR_equiv_cons. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply Permutation_cons_app. apply (Permutation_sym (perm_swap y x ys)). apply Permutation_cons_app_inv in IHIR_equivalent. apply Permutation_sym. apply IHIR_equivalent. - apply IR_equiv_trans with (l2:=ys). + apply IHIR_equivalent1. + apply IHIR_equivalent2.
